page.title: 11Shops in Hungerford.
page.content: Hungerford is a centre for antiques which is why Mr King opened his business here.Many of his customers come from abroad and he has been going now for 12 years.He obtains his antiques from private houses and auctions.It's most valuble item was a Regency vase sold for Â£950. Mr Butler,manager of Hungerford Auto parts told us he works 63 hours a week and mostly sells spray paints and motorbike oil.He orders his goods and is the only one who works there.Oct. Nov.is the best time.He's been open 362 days. Mr Reed,the manager of Spackmans has 15 people working in his shop which sells mainly cheese but also specialises in unusual items such as octopus and frogs legs .The shop attracts people from a wide area and he has even had enqiries from America.
